TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Turkey, title = Turkey, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turkey} }

S.FORM: Turkey hya' ga cyux maki' tay 39 00 N, 35 00 E na Aziya' ru Oco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 783,562 sq km (maki' tay 37ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 769,632 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 13,930 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 80,274,604. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga49.70% , lhlahuy hya' ga 14.90%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 35.40%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Ankara. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 29 na tay mawpuw byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, aring ryax 28 squ byacing tay 8 sa kawas 2014 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' panmwo:commons CIA 外交部

Torkey hya' ga cyox maki' tay 39 00 N, 35 00 E na Aziya' ro Oco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 783,562 sq km (maki' tay 37ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 769,632 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 13,930 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 80,274,604. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga49.70% , lhlahoy hya' ga 14.90%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 35.40%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Ankara. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 29 na tay mawpow byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, aring ryax 28 sqo byacing tay 8 sa kawas 2014 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' panmwo:commons CIA 外交部
